abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is investigating complaints that 2014 and 2015 Jeep Grand Cherokees can roll away after being put in park; will determine extent of problem before deciding on recall.
lead_paragraph: United States auto safety regulators are investigating complaints that some newer Jeeps can roll away unexpectedly after they are put in park.

headline.main: Auto Regulator Investigates Jeep Grand Cherokee Issue
headline.print_headline: Auto Regulator Investigates Jeep Grand Cherokee Issue

snippet: United States auto safety regulators are investigating complaints that some newer Jeeps can roll away unexpectedly after they are put in park.
